items.text: looks to use his feet but Mehidy pulls his length ball, Samuels adjusts to push it towards square leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Samuels, no run

items.text: length ball from around the wicket, Powell pushes and gets a thick inside edge towards square leg
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to R Powell, 1 run

items.text: length, just around off, defended on the front foot
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samuels, no run

items.text: back of length, on the stumps, punched towards long-on
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samuels, 1 run

items.preText: Yoel: ""Samuels and Tamim having a friendly chat at the other end meanwhile" Friendly as in really friendly, or as in Samuels-Stokes friendly?" -- Really friendly
items.text: fuller on off, pushed back
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to R Powell, no run

items.text: length outside off, defended towards cover-point
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to R Powell, no run

items.text: on the pads, goes back and looks to glance, misses
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to R Powell, no run

items.preText: Thanks Hemant. West Indies need something special if they want to get a competitive score
items.text: flatter on the stumps, turned away to the leg side
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Samuels, no run

items.text: big appeal that looked close. Given some air outside off, and breaks back sharply to go past bat and hit his pad. The batsman had come forward to defend. The umpire negates the appeal and they don't go for a review. Good call eventually because it was spinning so much it would have missed leg stump
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Samuels, 1 leg bye

items.text: carved away over cover for a single
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to R Powell, 1 run
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Samuels, 1 run

items.text: tossed up on off, he chips it over the circle and down to long-off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to R Powell, 1 run

items.text: tossed up again, he comes down the track and swipes it over midwicket. There's a fielder at deep square leg and one at long-on, but the ball just about beats them to the rope as they converge
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Samuels, FOUR runs

items.preText: zaman: "Mehidy has taken Hetmyer's wicket for the 5th time in this tour.....!!!"
items.text: length ball on middle and leg, went back and chipped it over midwicket
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to R Powell, 2 runs

items.text: wild swipe and dropped tossed up outside off and spinning away from the right-hander. He got down and tried to heave it away, got a top edge. Rubel at mid-off had all the time in the world, but ends up spilling it, running back
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to R Powell, 1 run

items.text: tossed up, patted back to the bowler
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samuels, no run

items.text: driven down to long off
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samuels, 1 run

items.text: flatter on the stumps, he stays back and punches to cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to R Powell, no run

items.text: tossed up, fuller on the stumps, pushed back to the bowler
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to R Powell, no run

items.text: length ball on off, driven to cover
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Samuels, no run

items.text: length ball, on leg stump. Variable bounce again, that kept a bit low. Gets his bat down in a hurry to push it into the leg side
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Samuels, no run

items.text: kept low again back of a length on off, he tried to swat it, but ends up under-edging it to midwicket
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Samuels, no run

items.text: that goes through at a good height. Shortish, very close to the body, too close to cut and he's beaten on the shot as the ball passes through at chest height
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Samuels, no run

items.text: strays on the pads and is flicked down to fine leg
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Samuels, 1 run

items.text: length ball on the stumps, tried to turn it away to square leg, leading edge and the ball plops down in front of him
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to R Powell, no run
